sentences.sContent: We asked Jason to write an essay about his hometown.
sentences.sCn: 我们让杰森写一篇关于他家乡的短文。

sentences.sContent: ...The author was not much surprised when his school teacher marked his essay as "flawless"...
...my mother and her red pen showed me how deeply flawed a flawless essay could be...
...Perhaps the point of writing the flawless essay was not to give up...
...I was to write the best essay I could...
